\begin{aligned}
y_t &= (1 - 0.4347L - (-0.2671)L^2)^{-1} (1 + (-0.3374)L) \epsilon_t \\
&= (1.2671L^2 - 0.4347L + 1) (1 - 0.3374L) \epsilon_t \\
&= (1.2671L^2 - 0.4347L + 1 - 0.3374L + 0.3374L^2) \epsilon_t \\
&= (1.6305L^2 - 0.7681L + 1) \epsilon_t \\
&= \epsilon_t + 1.6305 \epsilon_{t-1} - 0.7681 \epsilon_{t-2}
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
y_t &= (1 - 1.1041L - (-0.3583)L^2 - (0.2278)L^3)^{-1} \epsilon_t + 2923.30 \\
&= (1.2278L^3 - 0.3583L^2 - 1.1041L + 1) \epsilon_t + 2923.30 \\
&= (1.2278L^3 - 0.3583L^2 - 1.1041L + 1 + 1.1041L^3 - 0.3583L^2 + 1.1041L - 1) \epsilon_t + 2923.30 \\
&= (1.5861L^3 - 1.4656L^2 + 0.0418L) \epsilon_t + 2923.30 \\
&= 0.0418 \epsilon_t + 1.5861 \epsilon_{t-1} - 1.4656 \epsilon_{t-2} + 2923.30
\end{aligned}

\begin{aligned}
y_t &= \epsilon_t + 2923.30 \\
&= \epsilon_t + 2923.30 + 1.2278L^3 - 0.3583L^2 - 1.1041L + 1 \\
&= \epsilon_t + 2923.30 + 1.2278L^3 - 0.3583L^2 - 1.1041L + 1 + 1.1041L^3 - 0.3583L^2 + 1.1041L - 1 \\
&= \epsilon_t + 2923.30 + 1.5861L^3 - 1.4656L^2 + 0.0418L
\end{aligned}
